title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: An Age-Old Fear Grows More Common: ‘I’m Going To Die Alone’
items.description: As families fracture, people are living longer and are more likely to find themselves without close relatives or friends at the end of their lives.

items.title: Health insurance premiums are going up next year — unless you work at these companies
items.description: As U.S. health insurance costs rise, some companies are paying for all of their workers' premiums. It's a big expense — but they say it pays off.

items.title: 'Death fold' proteins can make cells self-destruct. Scientists want to control them
items.description: Scientists are hoping to treat diseases including cancer and Alzheimer's by influencing how cells make life-or-death decisions.
